title: Ministry Impact Fund
source: dev-notes/WP-pages/legacy giving(Planned giving's new name)/Ministry Impact Fund – AGFinancial.html
html:
Home » Services » Legacy Giving » Ministry Impact Fund

Any gift.

Any asset.

Unlocked.

Most wealth isn’t cash.

It’s assets. A Ministry Impact Fund® makes it easy for donors to give in any form. No administrative hassle—just streamlined generosity that expands giving options, maximizes tax deductions, and eliminates capital gains.

This is generosity without limits.

How it works
Make the transfer

Your donor transfers cash or asset(s) to your Ministry Impact Fund®, potentially receiving a charitable deduction and minimized or eliminated capital gains.

Give us the keys

AG Foundation liquidates the asset(s) for you, handling all administrative details.

Put it to work

Your ministry gains immediate access to the cash.

It starts with the donor gift.
  • Cash
  • Appreciated assets
  • Stock (see below)
  • Real estate
  • Gifts-in-kind
  • A variety of other gifts

Initial contribution required.

Open a Ministry Impact Fund®

Transferring stock? Start here.

Follow the two steps below. If you have questions or would like help, email plannedgiving@AGFinancial.org or call 417.447.2440.

1. Intent to Gift of Securities

Complete this form (ignore section 3) and submit it via this secure message link. Indicate “Attn: Jason Idell” in the secure message.

2. Brokerage Letter of Authorization (LOA)

Complete this form and submit it to your broker/dealer; however, notify the brokerage firm before sending the completed LOA form. Some broker/dealers may require additional paperwork.

More joy in receiving.
It’s easier than you think.

Your peeps want to donate non-cash assets. It’s cool. We will turn that thing into cold hard cash like magic.

We will never ask you to email through a button ever again.

A legacy of giving.

We’re ready to help you explore how your gift can continue to give. And give. And give…
